sourcesContent:
import { View, ScrollView, Text } from 'react-native';
import { ScrollViewNatura } from '../ScrollViews/ScrollViewNatura';
import { useFonts } from 'expo-font'
import { NavBar } from '../NavBar/NavBar'

export function MainPage() {
    const [fontsLoaded] = useFonts({
		'Raleway-Black': require('../../../assets/fonts/Raleway-Black.ttf'),
		'Raleway-Bold': require('../../../assets/fonts/Raleway-Bold.ttf'),
		'Raleway-Medium': require('../../../assets/fonts/Raleway-Medium.ttf'),
	});
    return (
        <View style={{backgroundColor: '#F9F9F9', flex: 1}}>
            <View style={{position: 'fixed', zIndex: 1, width: '100%', height: 150, backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF', shadowColor: "rgba(211, 38, 38, 0.25)", 
        shadowOffset: {
            width: 0,
            height: 4
        },
        elevation: 8,
        shadowOpacity: 1,}}>
                <Text style={{fontSize: 38, fontFamily: "Raleway-Black", top: 62, left: 20}}>Cosm√©ticos</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={{marginTop: 161}}>
                <ScrollView style={{height: 651, paddingBottom: 83}}>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, marginTop: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, marginTop: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, marginTop: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, marginTop: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 34, fontfamily: "Raleway-Bold", left: 28, marginBottom: 10, marginTop: 10, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Perfumes</Text>
                    <ScrollViewNatura></ScrollViewNatura>
                </ScrollView>
            </View>
            <NavBar style={{bottom: '0px'}}></NavBar>
        </View>
    )
}
